segments.text: Excuse me , I'd like to ask you a few questions about the city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My wife wants to take the children to go shopping , where is the best place to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would recommend the mall , it's about 20 minutes , drive to the south in a taxi . It has a wide range of shops and restaurants .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Also , we'd like to do some sightseeing while we're in town . Can you recommend some local attractions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a 10 - year-old boy and a 6 - year-old girl .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would recommend a day at the zoo . It's fun for all the family . There is also a water park just outside the city if you would like a day trip .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds marvelous . Thank you for your help .
segments.speaker: S1
